name: YetiFree
description:
GAMEPLAY:

Bring back the nostalgia of the 90's in this hilarious role reversal of the classic SkiFree. You now get to play as the Yeti that menaced the slopes and you are hungry! In YetiFree, you must actively eat as many skiers as you can to avoid falling back into hibernation. Smash, slam, and blast your way down the slopes to rack up the highest score. The pesky ski patrol and a few accidental avalanches might try to slow you down, but the Yeti must feed! OM NOM NOM NOM... BURP!

FEATURES:

  • Procedurally generated levels for infinite replayability
  • Robust physics to simulate every destructive action of the Yeti
  • Combos to convert your rage into big points
  • Steam Achievements to spice up every game with wacky goals
  • Steam Leaderboards to flaunt your top scores against your friends
  • Cloud Saves because we could
  • Available in English and Korean
  • Made with Godot
